advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your army suffers in the miserable conditions they find themselves, my lord. Move them on, or more warriors will fall to the elements.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your army has wandered into the Chaos Wastes! This is no place for your kind - withdraw them with all haste!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your army has wandered into the Chaos Wastes! This is no place for your kind - withdraw them with all haste!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The denizens are dangerously agitated, my lord! Soon they will take up arms against you. Move swiftly to crush or appease them!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Commerce! The life-blood of every nation, even more important than war for some. A trade agreement is being offered by a rival power. Such a deal would foster trust as well as generate income, but you must decide if it's the right thing to do.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your army has marched all it can, my lord. They must rest.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The enemy are upon you! To battle!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The enemy are upon you! To battle!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Natural resources are abundant in this place, my lord. Capture it, and its riches would be yours.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Natural resources are abundant in this place, my lord. Capture it, and its riches would be yours.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: A strategic overview can be useful in such uncertain times, Sire.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: A strategic overview can be useful in such uncertain times, Sire.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The terrain here is difficult, my lord. The progress of your army will be slow.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The terrain here is difficult, my lord. The progress of your army will be slow.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Consider merging some units in this army, my lord. They will be better placed to survive the glorious battles to come.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Consider merging some units in this army, my lord. They will be better placed to survive the glorious battles to come.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Winds of Magic blow across the land, my lord. Those who can harness it gain access to formidable power.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Winds of Magic blow across the land, my lord. Those who can harness it gain access to formidable power.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your prestige grows, my lord! News of your conquests spreads far and wide. Your developing power is noted by even the most distant of Kings and bestial Lords.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your prestige grows, my lord! News of your conquests spreads far and wide. Your developing power is noted by even the most distant of Kings and bestial Lords.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your conquests strike fear into the hearts of your enemies, mighty lord! The wisest amongst them will know that fate is on your side. I have foreseen it.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your conquests strike fear into the hearts of your enemies, mighty lord! The wisest amongst them will know that fate is on your side. I have foreseen it.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Oh, mighty lord, the fates have surely selected you for greatness! Thanks to my guidance, your tremendous power grows - as if driven by some divine power. Your enemies tremble before you!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Oh, mighty lord, the fates have surely selected you for greatness! Thanks to my guidance, your tremendous power grows - as if driven by some divine power. Your enemies tremble before you!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your reach grows yet further, great lord. Your endless victories are changing the very fates themselves! The world falls before your incredible power!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your reach grows yet further, great lord. Your endless victories are changing the very fates themselves! The world falls before your incredible power!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Destruction and death precede your armies, great lord! Your power is incalculable - it surely rivals even that of the Chaos Gods!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Destruction and death precede your armies, great lord! Your power is incalculable - it surely rivals even that of the Chaos Gods!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Be sure to make use of the Underway when moving your boyz through difficult terrain, mighty lord. Much time can be saved when moving below ground.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Be sure to make use of the Underway when moving your boyz through difficult terrain, mighty lord. Much time can be saved when moving below ground.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Position your most heavily-armoured troops at the front, Commander. There they will be best-placed for the enemy to waste their ammunition on.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Position your most heavily-armoured troops at the front, Commander. There they will be best-placed for the enemy to waste their ammunition on.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The enemy bring mighty weapons of war to the battle! Have them destroyed, Commander, or they will decimate your troops from afar.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The enemy bring mighty weapons of war to the battle! Have them destroyed, Commander, or they will decimate your troops from afar.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your ranged weapons may prove decisive in the coming battle, Commander. Bring them to bear against the enemy from afar, but be sure to protect them as well.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your ranged weapons may prove decisive in the coming battle, Commander. Bring them to bear against the enemy from afar, but be sure to protect them as well.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The enemy are taking the walls, Commander! Drive them back!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The enemy are taking the walls, Commander! Drive them back!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Send troops to capture the enemy defences, Commander. They can be turned to our service.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Send troops to capture the enemy defences, Commander. They can be turned to our service.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The enemy approach on mounts, Commander! Keep your vulnerable units close at hand.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The enemy approach on mounts, Commander! Keep your vulnerable units close at hand.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Be sure to use your mounted soldiers to full effect, Commander. Harass the enemy formation and strike at their weakest points.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Be sure to use your mounted soldiers to full effect, Commander. Harass the enemy formation and strike at their weakest points.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your soldiers are ready to deploy for battle, my lord. They await your orders.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your soldiers are ready to deploy for battle, my lord. They await your orders.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The enemy general is slain, my lord, cursing your name with his dying breath! Send his army after him!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The enemy general is slain, my lord, cursing your name with his dying breath! Send his army after him!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The enemy general has been wounded in battle, my lord, and can no longer lead his troops. Press home your advantage!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The enemy general has been wounded in battle, my lord, and can no longer lead his troops. Press home your advantage!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The enemy commander runs from the field, my lord, and a sorry spectacle it is too! His army will surely follow!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The enemy commander runs from the field, my lord, and a sorry spectacle it is too! His army will surely follow!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your army has marched long and hard, Commander. The troops have little strength left to fight - use it wisely!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your army has marched long and hard, Commander. The troops have little strength left to fight - use it wisely!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your warriors tire, mighty lord, their exertions dull their ability to fight. Give them time to rest, even amidst the thickest of battles.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your warriors tire, mighty lord, their exertions dull their ability to fight. Give them time to rest, even amidst the thickest of battles.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your troops will fire-at-will without orders to the contrary, Commander. Have them conserve their ammunition if you so wish.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your troops will fire-at-will without orders to the contrary, Commander. Have them conserve their ammunition if you so wish.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The enemy attack your flank, Commander! Drive them off!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The enemy attack your flank, Commander! Drive them off!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The enemy field flying troops, my lord. Bring them down if they approach your forces.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The enemy field flying troops, my lord. Bring them down if they approach your forces.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your flying units afford you great flexibility, Commander. Scout and harass the enemy as they manoeuvre.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your flying units afford you great flexibility, Commander. Scout and harass the enemy as they manoeuvre.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The forest may be used to conceal your movements, Commander. Close with the enemy under cover of the trees to retain the element of surprise.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The forest may be used to conceal your movements, Commander. Close with the enemy under cover of the trees to retain the element of surprise.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The enemy use the forests to conceal their movements, my lord! Approach with caution.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The enemy use the forests to conceal their movements, my lord! Approach with caution.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Group your units for best effect, Commander. Formations may be useful when manoeuvring before the enemy.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Group your units for best effect, Commander. Formations may be useful when manoeuvring before the enemy.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your commander has been killed in action, my lord! Word has already spread amongst your troops; they will surely lose heart.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your commander has been killed in action, my lord! Word has already spread amongst your troops; they will surely lose heart.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your general has been wounded in the fighting and carried from the field, Sire! His loss will be keenly felt by those left fighting.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your general has been wounded in the fighting and carried from the field, Sire! His loss will be keenly felt by those left fighting.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your general flees the field, my lord! A shameful display!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your general flees the field, my lord! A shameful display!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: A Giant, Commander! Take it down from afar! Don't let it near your massed infantry!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: A Giant, Commander! Take it down from afar! Don't let it near your massed infantry!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your Giant terrorises the enemy, great lord! Send it into the main body of the enemy, and watch the carnage unfold!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your Giant terrorises the enemy, great lord! Send it into the main body of the enemy, and watch the carnage unfold!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The high ground is yours, Commander. Be sure to use it to best advantage.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The high ground is yours, Commander. Be sure to use it to best advantage.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The enemy command the high ground. Attack with caution, my lord.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The enemy command the high ground. Attack with caution, my lord.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Be sure to use the maps available to assist your tactical planning, Commander.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Be sure to use the maps available to assist your tactical planning, Commander.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your troops come under fire, Commander! Have them find cover, or eliminate the source!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your troops come under fire, Commander! Have them find cover, or eliminate the source!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your warriors begin to rally, Sire! Steady their nerves, and they will be able to rejoin the fight.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your warriors begin to rally, Sire! Steady their nerves, and they will be able to rejoin the fight.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Allied reinforcements are arriving in support, Commander! Link up with them and surround the enemy.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Allied reinforcements are arriving in support, Commander! Link up with them and surround the enemy.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Enemy reinforcements are approaching! Attack with caution, Commander.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Enemy reinforcements are approaching! Attack with caution, Commander.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: My lord, word reaches us that your reinforcements are delayed! Stall the enemy until they arrive.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: My lord, word reaches us that your reinforcements are delayed! Stall the enemy until they arrive.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The enemy waver, my lord, their troops begin to flee! Run the cowards down!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The enemy waver, my lord, their troops begin to flee! Run the cowards down!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your craven warriors run from the battle, my lord! Round them up, and send them back to the fight!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your craven warriors run from the battle, my lord! Round them up, and send them back to the fight!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The enemy advance towards the city, Commander! Do all you can to stop them breaching the walls.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The enemy advance towards the city, Commander! Do all you can to stop them breaching the walls.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The siege weapons are ready, my lord! Deploy them against the enemy so we can see them in action!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The siege weapons are ready, my lord! Deploy them against the enemy so we can see them in action!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The siege weapons are in position, my lord, and are ready to begin their assault. Begin your advance!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The enemy have captured the city centre, Commander! Retake it quickly, before the entire settlement falls!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The enemy have captured the city centre, Commander! Retake it quickly, before the entire settlement falls!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The city is falling to the enemy, Commander! Intercept them before it is taken!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The city is falling to the enemy, Commander! Intercept them before it is taken!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The heart of the city is within sight, my lord! Press forward!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The heart of the city is within sight, my lord! Press forward!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The centre is yours! Defend it against the enemy that remain, my lord. The city will surely fall soon.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The centre is yours! Defend it against the enemy that remain, my lord. The city will surely fall soon.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The terrain conceals the enemy's movements, Commander. We must be wary!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The terrain conceals the enemy's movements, Commander. We must be wary!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: You may use the hills, valleys... and stranger formations of this place to your advantage, Commander. The terrain can conceal your forces.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: You may use the hills, valleys... and stranger formations of this place to your advantage, Commander. The terrain can conceal your forces.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Winds of Magic blow strongly in this place, Commander. Harness its power and channel it against your enemy.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Winds of Magic blow strongly in this place, Commander. Harness its power and channel it against your enemy.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The enemy use magic against us, Commander. Damn their sorcery!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The enemy use magic against us, Commander. Damn their sorcery!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: You are the Everchosen - the Chaos Gods call you to action, mighty champion. Their lust for ruin must be sated.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: You are the Everchosen - the Chaos Gods call you to action, mighty champion. Their lust for ruin must be sated.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: You shall go into the lands of the mortals to spread fear and destruction. The Norse tribes to the west shall fall easily before you: bind those willing to join your cause, and slay the rest.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: You shall go into the lands of the mortals to spread fear and destruction. The Norse tribes to the west shall fall easily before you: bind those willing to join your cause, and slay the rest.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Further to the south lie the nations of men. They will resist your advance, and for good reason. You will bring them annihilation, mighty lord.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Further to the south lie the nations of men. They will resist your advance, and for good reason. You will bring them annihilation, mighty lord.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Devour the mortal souls to bring the favour of the Chaos Gods. March forth, and spread oblivion in their name!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Devour the mortal souls to bring the favour of the Chaos Gods. March forth, and spread oblivion in their name!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your kind are the will of the Dark Gods made manifest, mighty lord. Harness the gifts afforded to you by the Ruinous Powers and you shall be unstoppable.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your kind are the will of the Dark Gods made manifest, mighty lord. Harness the gifts afforded to you by the Ruinous Powers and you shall be unstoppable.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your warriors live their lives on the march, mighty lord. The hordes have no need for towns or cities. Raze all that you find in the name of the Dark Gods!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your warriors live their lives on the march, mighty lord. The hordes have no need for towns or cities. Raze all that you find in the name of the Dark Gods!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The enemy begin to crumble! Press home your advantage! Grind them to dust!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The enemy begin to crumble! Press home your advantage! Grind them to dust!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The enemy general shows himself. Van Kruger joins the battle, he fights amidst his mounted troops!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The enemy general shows himself. Van Kruger joins the battle, he fights amidst his mounted troops!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Sorcery can turn the tide of battle! Unleash your mightiest spells against the enemy, dark lord.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Sorcery can turn the tide of battle! Unleash your mightiest spells against the enemy, dark lord.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Attack the sides and the rear of the enemy where possible. They will crumble to dust if surrounded.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Attack the sides and the rear of the enemy where possible. They will crumble to dust if surrounded.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your grip on Drakenhof is not yet secure, dark lord. Pacify those that stir against your rule before they take arms and rise up.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your grip on Drakenhof is not yet secure, dark lord. Pacify those that stir against your rule before they take arms and rise up.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Goblins are getting lazy, you need to keep them busy or they will get up to mischief! Build them a place of work. Within suitable facilities the craftiest of their kind may be tasked with researching new methods of war.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Goblins are getting lazy, you need to keep them busy or they will get up to mischief! Build them a place of work. Within suitable facilities the craftiest of their kind may be tasked with researching new methods of war.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your Empire is a beacon of civility in a savage world, sire. It is your task - nay, your privilege, to see that it does not fall to the countless evils that threaten its borders. Study your own strengths, and those of your enemy, carefully.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your Empire is a beacon of civility in a savage world, sire. It is your task - nay, your privilege, to see that it does not fall to the countless evils that threaten its borders. Study your own strengths, and those of your enemy, carefully.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Battle is upon us, my lord! The enemy mass in great strength, see for yourself. You may wish to consider whether an attack would be wise.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Battle is upon us, my lord! The enemy mass in great strength, see for yourself. You may wish to consider whether an attack would be wise.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your forces meet with defeat! Gather the survivors, rebuild your strength, and take the fight back to the enemy!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your forces meet with defeat! Gather the survivors, rebuild your strength, and take the fight back to the enemy!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The city has been reached and your warriors are prepared for battle, mighty lord. Study your options, nevertheless - encircling the enemy and starving them out may be the wisest course of action.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The city has been reached and your warriors are prepared for battle, mighty lord. Study your options, nevertheless - encircling the enemy and starving them out may be the wisest course of action.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Raid the lands of the enemy, mighty lord! Send your warriors out to slaughter the peasants and burn their villages. Make the enemy fear you!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Raid the lands of the enemy, mighty lord! Send your warriors out to slaughter the peasants and burn their villages. Make the enemy fear you!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Consider raising a camp in the lands of the enemy, savage lord. It shall become a base from which your warriors can raid these pathetic lands.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Consider raising a camp in the lands of the enemy, savage lord. It shall become a base from which your warriors can raid these pathetic lands.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Relations with foreign powers may be managed through diplomacy, my lord. Consider your situation carefully before accepting any agreement.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Relations with foreign powers may be managed through diplomacy, my lord. Consider your situation carefully before accepting any agreement.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The enemy general joins the battle at last! Gnashrak fights amidst his mounted warriors. Cut him down!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The enemy general joins the battle at last! Gnashrak fights amidst his mounted warriors. Cut him down!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Gnashrak flees the valley! The grobi that remain will surely lose the will to fight.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Gnashrak flees the valley! The grobi that remain will surely lose the will to fight.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Goblin army lies ahead, Emperor! They are preparing for an attack on Altdorf - see for yourself!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Goblin army lies ahead, Emperor! They are preparing for an attack on Altdorf - see for yourself!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Pillage and burn all you find here, mighty lord. The lands are not suitable for your kind to settle.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Pillage and burn all you find here, mighty lord. The lands are not suitable for your kind to settle.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: You can’t let that Black Orc, Grimgor, have all the fun. There is a reason they call you ‘the slaughterer’ - show them all why!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: You can’t let that Black Orc, Grimgor, have all the fun. There is a reason they call you ‘the slaughterer’ - show them all why!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The sacred peak of Karaz-a-Karak is secure, Sire. The spineless Greenskins shrink before your might and have run for their burrows.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The sacred peak of Karaz-a-Karak is secure, Sire. The spineless Greenskins shrink before your might and have run for their burrows.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Bloody Spearz still infest the mountains to the east of Karaz-a-Karak, setting up their hovels amidst sacred pillars. Before you can return to the Slayer Keep of Karak Kadrin, the trespassers must be destroyed. Summon the throng, and march against them.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Bloody Spearz still infest the mountains to the east of Karaz-a-Karak, setting up their hovels amidst sacred pillars. Before you can return to the Slayer Keep of Karak Kadrin, the trespassers must be destroyed. Summon the throng, and march against them.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The von Carsteins have risen once again, mighty Lichemaster, and you are to march into the world as their chosen champion. Let them believe you are their willing puppet… for now. There is much to be done.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The von Carsteins have risen once again, mighty Lichemaster, and you are to march into the world as their chosen champion. Let them believe you are their willing puppet… for now. There is much to be done.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: A great destiny awaits you, Kemmler, it has been foreseen… Bring about eternal night and you shall be rewarded!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: A great destiny awaits you, Kemmler, it has been foreseen… Bring about eternal night and you shall be rewarded!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Greenskins scurry back to their dirtholes, lord. However, it remains a time of crisis for the Empire.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Greenskins scurry back to their dirtholes, lord. However, it remains a time of crisis for the Empire.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Secessionists hostile to the election of Emperor Karl Franz are trying to form a breakaway province to the south. We need a stable Empire if you are to study the arcane texts - you must put an end to their senseless revolt.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Secessionists hostile to the election of Emperor Karl Franz are trying to form a breakaway province to the south. We need a stable Empire if you are to study the arcane texts - you must put an end to their senseless revolt.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: To the north, Boris Todbringer of Middenheim - a bitter rival of the recent election - plots openly against the Emperor. Be warned that, should diplomacy fail, war with Todbringer will be unavoidable. Be sure to build your forces.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: To the north, Boris Todbringer of Middenheim - a bitter rival of the recent election - plots openly against the Emperor. Be warned that, should diplomacy fail, war with Todbringer will be unavoidable. Be sure to build your forces.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: In all the Empire, there is none more powerful than you, Supreme Patriarch. Show the Emperor’s enemies your arcane might!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: In all the Empire, there is none more powerful than you, Supreme Patriarch. Show the Emperor’s enemies your arcane might!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: You have slumbered long, Shaggoth. Arise, mighty Kholek - it is time to bring ruin to the earthly realms!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: You have slumbered long, Shaggoth. Arise, mighty Kholek - it is time to bring ruin to the earthly realms!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your adopted father calls you, Sigvald. The Dark Prince desires destruction and perversion of the world. Let it begin!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your adopted father calls you, Sigvald. The Dark Prince desires destruction and perversion of the world. Let it begin!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Age of Reckoning has begun, Slayer King. You are no stranger to oaths, Ungrim, so swear that the Karaz Ankor will be great again!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Age of Reckoning has begun, Slayer King. You are no stranger to oaths, Ungrim, so swear that the Karaz Ankor will be great again!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your territory expands, savage lord, yet there are many lands to conquer. In time, I foresee war with the greater tribes of the Badlands, as well as the stunted kind that dwell beneath the mountains. Keep your axe sharp, for Mork and Gork watch your progress with interest!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your territory expands, savage lord, yet there are many lands to conquer. In time, I foresee war with the greater tribes of the Badlands, as well as the stunted kind that dwell beneath the mountains. Keep your axe sharp, for Mork and Gork watch your progress with interest!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your burgeoning realm grows, your eminence, yet many evils still abound in this world. The Empire remains divided, and marauding Greenskins still threaten your lands. Further afield, there are rumours of a dark force rising in the east, spreading the taint of Undeath. You must remain vigilant.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your burgeoning realm grows, your eminence, yet many evils still abound in this world. The Empire remains divided, and marauding Greenskins still threaten your lands. Further afield, there are rumours of a dark force rising in the east, spreading the taint of Undeath. You must remain vigilant.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The taint of Undeath is spread by your conquests, mighty lord. Your realm grows, and more distant lands now fall under your gaze. The Empire and other kingdoms of men lie to the north and west: there you may feast, for the living are plentiful.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The taint of Undeath is spread by your conquests, mighty lord. Your realm grows, and more distant lands now fall under your gaze. The Empire and other kingdoms of men lie to the north and west: there you may feast, for the living are plentiful.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your Dawi have been put to work fixing up the captured city, Sire. Yet there are many grudges still to settle. Perfidious Manlings and bloodthirsty Vampires threaten your kind in the north, and your mountain will never be safe while a single Greenskin draws breath. To war!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your Dawi have been put to work fixing up the captured city, Sire. Yet there are many grudges still to settle. Perfidious Manlings and bloodthirsty Vampires threaten your kind in the north, and your mountain will never be safe while a single Greenskin draws breath. To war!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Oblivion has come, my lord! Archaon the Everchosen, Lord of the End Times, has re-entered the world. With him marches a Chaos host numberless in size. Prepare yourself for the coming apocalypse!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Oblivion has come, my lord! Archaon the Everchosen, Lord of the End Times, has re-entered the world. With him marches a Chaos host numberless in size. Prepare yourself for the coming apocalypse!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Everchosen himself, Archaon, has been sighted. He leads a host of immeasurable power. Do not face him in battle unprepared!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Everchosen himself, Archaon, has been sighted. He leads a host of immeasurable power. Do not face him in battle unprepared!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The world rejoices: Archaeon is defeated! This is a great victory, yours is the glory. And yet, I suspect you have not seen the last of such a mighty foe. Beware his return.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The world rejoices: Archaeon is defeated! This is a great victory, yours is the glory. And yet, I suspect you have not seen the last of such a mighty foe. Beware his return.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The defenders of Altdorf emerge to join the fight! See how the Greenskins run when surrounded!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The defenders of Altdorf emerge to join the fight! See how the Greenskins run when surrounded!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your men are engaging the enemy from all sides, Sire! Be sure to join the fight yourself!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your men are engaging the enemy from all sides, Sire! Be sure to join the fight yourself!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Misdeeds committed against your kind are recorded in the venerable Book of Grudges - the Dammaz Kron. Once documented, no transgression should remain unpunished, my King.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Misdeeds committed against your kind are recorded in the venerable Book of Grudges - the Dammaz Kron. Once documented, no transgression should remain unpunished, my King.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: A quest has been issued, mighty lord - a great adventure beckons. Be wary, though, for while the potential rewards are great, so too are the perils.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: A quest has been issued, mighty lord - a great adventure beckons. Be wary, though, for while the potential rewards are great, so too are the perils.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Assistance is available should you need it, my lord. You may rely upon it.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Assistance is available should you need it, my lord. You may rely upon it.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The defences must fall, my lord. Storm the city! Press your attack!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The defences must fall, my lord. Storm the city! Press your attack!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Grave news, my lord. Word is spreading across the land of a dark power rising in the northern wastes. The armies of Chaos are on the move: they surely plan to invade the world of mortals once again.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Grave news, my lord. Word is spreading across the land of a dark power rising in the northern wastes. The armies of Chaos are on the move: they surely plan to invade the world of mortals once again.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Prepare your defences well, for the forces of Chaos spare no-one in their quest for bloodshed.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Prepare your defences well, for the forces of Chaos spare no-one in their quest for bloodshed.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Take steps to reduce corruption spreading further amongst your followers or they may turn against you to serve a new master...

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Take steps to reduce corruption spreading further amongst your followers or they may turn against you to serve a new master...

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your army suffers in the miserable conditions they find themselves, my lord. Move them on, or more warriors will fall to the elements.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your army suffers in the miserable conditions they find themselves, my lord. Move them on, or more warriors will fall to the elements.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: "Tduigu-Uis" - a greeting in your tongue, my bestial Lord. I know you feel a yearning to kill me, for I am but a man, but you have received the vision, you know who has sent me… my desire is as yours - to see the Cloven Ones tear down all civilisation! So let us begin...

advice_levels.onscreen_text: "Tduigu-Uis" - a greeting in your tongue, my bestial Lord. I know you feel a yearning to kill me, for I am but a man, but you have received the vision, you know who has sent me… my desire is as yours - to see the Cloven Ones tear down all civilisation! So let us begin...

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: To the north, past the mystic forest of Athel Loren, is Bretonnia. Arrogant and aloof, its glittering spires a sure sign of self-righteousness. You should bring ruin to this "pretty" realm.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: To the north, past the mystic forest of Athel Loren, is Bretonnia. Arrogant and aloof, its glittering spires a sure sign of self-righteousness. You should bring ruin to this "pretty" realm.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: East of Bretonnia lies the Empire, the very pinnacle of mankind's hubris. Its capital, Altdorf, is the centre of power and a symbol of its surety. Reduce it all to rubble - let pandemonium reign. The Empire is powerful, but divided. You must strike soon, for it may yet unify and seek to bring "civilisation" to the blood-grounds.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: East of Bretonnia lies the Empire, the very pinnacle of mankind's hubris. Its capital, Altdorf, is the centre of power and a symbol of its surety. Reduce it all to rubble - let pandemonium reign. The Empire is powerful, but divided. You must strike soon, for it may yet unify and seek to bring "civilisation" to the blood-grounds.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: To the south, the Border Princes hold a tentative grip on all that they call theirs, yet they are isolated by the mountains and the Blackfire Pass - soft targets for a hungry herd such as ours.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: To the south, the Border Princes hold a tentative grip on all that they call theirs, yet they are isolated by the mountains and the Blackfire Pass - soft targets for a hungry herd such as ours.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Destruction is in your blood, Nuis Ghurleth, and the world must know it. Sow as much as you can - the Cloven Ones shall destroy the world of man!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Destruction is in your blood, Nuis Ghurleth, and the world must know it. Sow as much as you can - the Cloven Ones shall destroy the world of man!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: I Khazrak One-Eye! Bring ruin to man!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: I Khazrak One-Eye! Bring ruin to man!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Man of wolf god battles man of hammer! This our blood-ground! Warherd destroy sacred temples!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Man of wolf god battles man of hammer! This our blood-ground! Warherd destroy sacred temples!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Greenskins live at Black Pit. Not warherd problem. They fight man. Good for warherd.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Greenskins live at Black Pit. Not warherd problem. They fight man. Good for warherd.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Warherds dwell in forests. Grow strong before them. Khazrak claim!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Warherds dwell in forests. Grow strong before them. Khazrak claim!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Todbringer. Petty man. Take his eye. Burn Todbringer's place! Warherd; go. Go now! RAAAARGH!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Todbringer. Petty man. Take his eye. Burn Todbringer's place! Warherd; go. Go now! RAAAARGH!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your hour approaches, Crowfather. Here, amongst the ruins of Mourkain, a once-proud city of mankind, you have prophesised the end of all Uncloven. Yet the time for portends is done - we must move.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your hour approaches, Crowfather. Here, amongst the ruins of Mourkain, a once-proud city of mankind, you have prophesised the end of all Uncloven. Yet the time for portends is done - we must move.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: In distant lands, other warherds move through their own blood-grounds. In time, you may encounter them, as either friend or foe. Know that you have kin, but trust only in yourself.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: In distant lands, other warherds move through their own blood-grounds. In time, you may encounter them, as either friend or foe. Know that you have kin, but trust only in yourself.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Further north, past the mystic forest of Athel Loren, is Bretonnia. Arrogant and aloof, its glittering spires a sure sign of self-righteousness. You should bring ruin to this "pretty" realm.

Reduce it all to rubble - let pandemonium reign. The Empire is powerful, but divided. You must strike soon, for it may yet unify and seek to bring "civilisation" to the blood-grounds.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: You are the Children of Chaos, as much a part of the Ruinous Powers as the horns that sprout from your head. Your kind yearns for destruction; to root out order and civilisation and despoil it! March forth, and spread the corrupting taint of the Dark Gods!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: You are the Children of Chaos, as much a part of the Ruinous Powers as the horns that sprout from your head. Your kind yearns for destruction; to root out order and civilisation and despoil it! March forth, and spread the corrupting taint of the Dark Gods!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your warherds live their lives on the march, mighty lord. The Cloven Ones have no need for towns or cities. Raze all that you find in the name of the Dark Gods!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your warherds live their lives on the march, mighty lord. The Cloven Ones have no need for towns or cities. Raze all that you find in the name of the Dark Gods!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: There is rage inside you; I can feel it, just as there is in all true-horns! It is a gift from the Granter of Savage Hate - keep the fury contained within and then unleash it at the right moment!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: There is rage inside you; I can feel it, just as there is in all true-horns! It is a gift from the Granter of Savage Hate - keep the fury contained within and then unleash it at the right moment!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Gors must fight and feast on flesh, my Lord. If they remain passive too long, their bestial instincts will see them turn on each other.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Gors must fight and feast on flesh, my Lord. If they remain passive too long, their bestial instincts will see them turn on each other.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The beast-paths are hidden ways known only to the Cloven Ones. Use them, my brutal Lord, to traverse the forests.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The beast-paths are hidden ways known only to the Cloven Ones. Use them, my brutal Lord, to traverse the forests.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Good, good! Unleash the rage within! The warherds have gathered and a brayherd has been formed. Harness its fury and crush your enemies!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Good, good! Unleash the rage within! The warherds have gathered and a brayherd has been formed. Harness its fury and crush your enemies!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Consider making camp, Beastlord. An encampment will draw more Gors to your cause, allowing your followers time to lick their wounds and give tribute to the Dark Gods.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Consider making camp, Beastlord. An encampment will draw more Gors to your cause, allowing your followers time to lick their wounds and give tribute to the Dark Gods.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Be wary... The Children of Chaos are close. The Beastmen are servants of the Ruinous Powers, who crave the end of all civilisation. They care not which gods you follow; to them your warriors are prey!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Be wary... The Children of Chaos are close. The Beastmen are servants of the Ruinous Powers, who crave the end of all civilisation. They care not which gods you follow; to them your warriors are prey!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: My Lord, a brayherd has been sighted! These Beastmen have caught the scent of blood and begun to stampede in great numbers - be wary of crossing their path!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: My Lord, a brayherd has been sighted! These Beastmen have caught the scent of blood and begun to stampede in great numbers - be wary of crossing their path!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your following grows, mighty Lord. Put your new hands to work: have them raise new infrastructure to improve your camp, and further your war effort.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your following grows, mighty Lord. Put your new hands to work: have them raise new infrastructure to improve your camp, and further your war effort.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The despicable armies of darkness have assaulted this place, slaughtering all they can find and razing the town to dust. They have left an artefact to spread the foul taint of Chaos across the land. Destroy it!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The despicable armies of darkness have assaulted this place, slaughtering all they can find and razing the town to dust. They have left an artefact to spread the foul taint of Chaos across the land. Destroy it!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your warriors have raised an artefact of worship to the Dark Gods in the rubble of this wretched place. It spreads the taint of Chaos across the land, mighty Lord, weakening the resolve of those that might stand against you.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your warriors have raised an artefact of worship to the Dark Gods in the rubble of this wretched place. It spreads the taint of Chaos across the land, mighty Lord, weakening the resolve of those that might stand against you.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Spells may be overcast to increase their potency, my Lord. Yet I advise caution: channelling so much raw magic at once brings the risk of disaster.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Spells may be overcast to increase their potency, my Lord. Yet I advise caution: channelling so much raw magic at once brings the risk of disaster.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your kind suffer on this untainted soil, Dark Lord. Capture these lands, and spread your influence across them.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your kind suffer on this untainted soil, Dark Lord. Capture these lands, and spread your influence across them.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The lands of the enemy are close, Dark Lord. Spread your corruption there ahead of any invasion. Weaken them from within!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The lands of the enemy are close, Dark Lord. Spread your corruption there ahead of any invasion. Weaken them from within!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The foul taint of this place weakens your warriors, my Lord. Do not linger here without good reason.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The dark taint of the enemy festers in this place. Take steps to reduce corruption spreading further amongst your followers, or they may turn against you to serve a new master...

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Though the Dwarfs and Greenskins lie between us and the realms of man, Malagor, they are trifling obstacles. You are the Dark Omen - Dhar Armeu - destined to bring an unending age of destruction to man's Uncloven world!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Though the Dwarfs and Greenskins lie between us and the realms of man, Malagor, they are trifling obstacles. You are the Dark Omen - Dhar Armeu - destined to bring an unending age of destruction to man's Uncloven world!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Greenskins scurry back to their dirt holes, Grand Theogonist. However, it remains a time of crisis for the Empire.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Greenskins scurry back to their dirt holes, Grand Theogonist. However, it remains a time of crisis for the Empire.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Secessionists hostile to the election of Emperor Karl Franz are trying to form a breakaway province to the south. The Empire must be united and stabilised if you are to pursue the ideals of Sigmar and purge Chaos from the world.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Secessionists hostile to the election of Emperor Karl Franz are trying to form a breakaway province to the south. The Empire must be united and stabilised if you are to pursue the ideals of Sigmar and purge Chaos from the world.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: To the north, Boris Todbringer of Middenheim - a bitter rival of the recent election - plots openly against the Emperor. Be warned that, should diplomacy fail, war with Todbringer will be unavoidable. Be sure to build your forces.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: To the north, Boris Todbringer of Middenheim - a bitter rival of the recent election - plots openly against the Emperor. Be warned that, should diplomacy fail, war with Todbringer will be unavoidable. Be sure to build your forces.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Sigmar's will awaits, my lord Volkmar. The Empire's enemies must be faced, and heresy must be purged in every corner of the world!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Sigmar's will awaits, my lord Volkmar. The Empire's enemies must be faced, and heresy must be purged in every corner of the world!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Glory to you, Vlad, first of the von Carstein line. Though you are again ascendant, your rightful home, Castle Drakenhof, is kept from you by Mannfred. And there are yet more who would see you undone…

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Glory to you, Vlad, first of the von Carstein line. Though you are again ascendant, your rightful home, Castle Drakenhof, is kept from you by Mannfred. And there are yet more who would see you undone…

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Templehof brood control the lands to the north, as far as the River Stir. They defy your hegemony as the first and greatest of the Vampire Counts. Raise the Undead hosts, take their lands, and burn their crypts for this insolence.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Templehof brood control the lands to the north, as far as the River Stir. They defy your hegemony as the first and greatest of the Vampire Counts. Raise the Undead hosts, take their lands, and burn their crypts for this insolence.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The high mountains to the south are infested with Dwarfs. Your homelands will never be safe with such an enemy so close. Make plans to drive their stunted kind out!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The high mountains to the south are infested with Dwarfs. Your homelands will never be safe with such an enemy so close. Make plans to drive their stunted kind out!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Greatness runs throughout the von Carstein bloodline, my lord; YOUR greatness. You are the master of Sylvania, of all Unliving and, soon, the world!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Greatness runs throughout the von Carstein bloodline, my lord; YOUR greatness. You are the master of Sylvania, of all Unliving and, soon, the world!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Castle Drakenhof is yours, my lord Necromancer - the ancestral home of the von Carsteins. You are the arbiter of their success, and at the vanguard of their conquests.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Castle Drakenhof is yours, my lord Necromancer - the ancestral home of the von Carsteins. You are the arbiter of their success, and at the vanguard of their conquests.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Templehof brood control the lands to the north, as far as the River Stir. They cannot be suffered to endure, lest they threaten your strength. Raise your forces, march on the foe, and show them true terror.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Templehof brood control the lands to the north, as far as the River Stir. They cannot be suffered to endure, lest they threaten your strength. Raise your forces, march on the foe, and show them true terror.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The resurgent von Carsteins have chosen you, master Necromancer, to conquer in their name. What darkness could you seek? What horrors could you awaken? All you need do is feign obedience…

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The resurgent von Carsteins have chosen you, master Necromancer, to conquer in their name. What darkness could you seek? What horrors could you awaken? All you need do is feign obedience…

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Let the graves open like wounds in the very earth, master Necromancer. Let the Undead spill forth and conquer. Let the last words on the lips of the fallen be "Helman Ghorst"!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Let the graves open like wounds in the very earth, master Necromancer. Let the Undead spill forth and conquer. Let the last words on the lips of the fallen be "Helman Ghorst"!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Clan Angrund is adrift, my lord Belegar, yet hope remains. The Dwarflords of Karak Izor have sponsored your quest to retake your ancestral home - a chance yet lingers!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Clan Angrund is adrift, my lord Belegar, yet hope remains. The Dwarflords of Karak Izor have sponsored your quest to retake your ancestral home - a chance yet lingers!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The journey will be long and perilous - there is much ground between here and your throne, and enemies are everywhere. To the north, the treacherous and duplicitous Skarsnik, self-proclaimed Warlord of Karak Eight Peaks, moves to usurp your birthright once more. Time is of the essence!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The journey will be long and perilous - there is much ground between here and your throne, and enemies are everywhere. To the north, the treacherous and duplicitous Skarsnik, self-proclaimed Warlord of Karak Eight Peaks, moves to usurp your birthright once more. Time is of the essence!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Yet in the east, the Badlands teem with more Greenskins, and even the Border Princes may wish to exploit your plight. You must not relent.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Yet in the east, the Badlands teem with more Greenskins, and even the Border Princes may wish to exploit your plight. You must not relent.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Through your rage and determination, the fortress of Karak Eight Peaks shall be returned to Dwarf rule once again with you, Belegar Ironhammer, as its rightful King!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Through your rage and determination, the fortress of Karak Eight Peaks shall be returned to Dwarf rule once again with you, Belegar Ironhammer, as its rightful King!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: From your redoubt in Karak Azgaraz, you have plotted your return to the Eight Peaks, stolen by filthy, perfidious Greenskin rebels.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: From your redoubt in Karak Azgaraz, you have plotted your return to the Eight Peaks, stolen by filthy, perfidious Greenskin rebels.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The road back to the Peaks will not be simple. You must head east, into Empire territory. Humans have no love for Greenskins, so you must fight tooth and nail to overcome them.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The road back to the Peaks will not be simple. You must head east, into Empire territory. Humans have no love for Greenskins, so you must fight tooth and nail to overcome them.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Past the Empire, both the Border Princes and the Dwarfs will attempt to hamper you further, but you must destroy all in your path.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Past the Empire, both the Border Princes and the Dwarfs will attempt to hamper you further, but you must destroy all in your path.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: To the south, in Karak Izor, the foul Belegar Ironhammer has aspirations to reclaim his ancestral home. The Eight Peaks are yours, Skarsnik - do not relent until the threat is dealt with and they are back under your control.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: To the south, in Karak Izor, the foul Belegar Ironhammer has aspirations to reclaim his ancestral home. The Eight Peaks are yours, Skarsnik - do not relent until the threat is dealt with and they are back under your control.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your enemies are belligerent and won’t necessarily cow down to your indomitable will - they need to be tamed, broken or annihilated!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your enemies are belligerent and won’t necessarily cow down to your indomitable will - they need to be tamed, broken or annihilated!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: You have overthrown rebellions before, and will do so again. All those who oppose you will face your rage, and then the hunger of Gobbla, of course. Destroy and devour all those who stand against you!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: You have overthrown rebellions before, and will do so again. All those who oppose you will face your rage, and then the hunger of Gobbla, of course. Destroy and devour all those who stand against you!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Green Godz have led you to Ekrund, Lord Wurrzag! What do they whisper now? Are the Badlands ready for the taking?

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Green Godz have led you to Ekrund, Lord Wurrzag! What do they whisper now? Are the Badlands ready for the taking?

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The nearby area is teeming with tribes of inferior Greenskins; to the east, the Teef Snatchaz and Red Fangs gather, eager to exploit you and regain lost lands. Yet you are chosen by the gods - they will see that you prevail.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Demonstrate your strength to these weaklings, and tribes of lesser Orcs will flock to your banner, freeing you to pursue your twisted prophecies. The stunted Dwarfs that dwell in the mountains around you should provide plentiful quarry.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Demonstrate your strength to these weaklings, and tribes of lesser Orcs will flock to your banner, freeing you to pursue your twisted prophecies. The stunted Dwarfs that dwell in the mountains around you should provide plentiful quarry.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: There are many who will not listen to your words, who call you misguided or mad. They will be brought to heel - you have foreseen it!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: There are many who will not listen to your words, who call you misguided or mad. They will be brought to heel - you have foreseen it!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: You are the Great Green Prophet, Wurrzag. You have been promised greatness by the gods - now go and claim it!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: You are the Great Green Prophet, Wurrzag. You have been promised greatness by the gods - now go and claim it!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Hail to you, Grombrindal, Ancestor of legend. You have secured Karaz-a-Karak, defended it from the Greenskin fiends and put their gutless horde to rout.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Hail to you, Grombrindal, Ancestor of legend. You have secured Karaz-a-Karak, defended it from the Greenskin fiends and put their gutless horde to rout.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Yet more remains undone - the Bloody Spearz still infest the mountains to the east, setting up their hovels amidst your sacred pillars. Dwarfen lands lay sullied by their sickening taint! You must be the hero of the ancient sagas, and march for their deliverance.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Yet more remains undone - the Bloody Spearz still infest the mountains to the east, setting up their hovels amidst your sacred pillars. Dwarfen lands lay sullied by their sickening taint! You must be the hero of the ancient sagas, and march for their deliverance.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: To the south, yet more vicious urki and grobi lay ready to strike at your kin, perhaps even the loathsome Black Goblin. Know that there are other Dwarfen lords who would gladly ally with one so legendary as you, for common cause.
