onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Dwarfs will know a new age of prosperity, heralded by the battle cry of Grombrindal, the White Dwarf!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Dwarfs will know a new age of prosperity, heralded by the battle cry of Grombrindal, the White Dwarf!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The strength of the forest realms is governed by the Elven Council. Here, the noble Lords and Ladies of Athel Loren bestow the forest's great wisdom and knowledge upon their subjects.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The strength of the forest realms is governed by the Elven Council. Here, the noble Lords and Ladies of Athel Loren bestow the forest's great wisdom and knowledge upon their subjects.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The strength of the forest realms is governed here, through the Gathering of the Ancients. The Treemen Ancients bestow great wisdom and knowledge upon their realm.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The strength of the forest realms is governed here, through the Gathering of the Ancients. The Treemen Ancients bestow great wisdom and knowledge upon their realm.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Formed from resin from the Oak of Ages' broken roots, Amber can be found across the world. If Athel Loren is to be protected from those who wish the forest harm, then as much as possible must be recovered.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Formed from resin from the Oak of Ages' broken roots, Amber can be found across the world. If Athel Loren is to be protected from those who wish the forest harm, then as much as possible must be recovered.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your Amber wealth has been depleted, my Lord. Now, there is a deficit - this will cause issues if the situation is left unresolved. Find more and return it to Athel Loren with haste!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your Amber wealth has been depleted, my Lord. Now, there is a deficit - this will cause issues if the situation is left unresolved. Find more and return it to Athel Loren with haste!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Oak of Ages is the source of all life in the forest. Treat it with care and it will flourish; neglect its wellbeing and leave Athel Loren wide open before the forces of destruction!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Oak of Ages is the source of all life in the forest. Treat it with care and it will flourish; neglect its wellbeing and leave Athel Loren wide open before the forces of destruction!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: At Athel Loren's centre, the glorious Oak of Ages blossoms into life.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: At Athel Loren's centre, the glorious Oak of Ages blossoms into life.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The mighty Oak of Ages blooms, pushing its canopy further over Athel Loren’s enchanting glades.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The mighty Oak of Ages blooms, pushing its canopy further over Athel Loren’s enchanting glades.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Magnificent, my Lord! The Oak of Ages flourishes under your benevolent nurture.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Magnificent, my Lord! The Oak of Ages flourishes under your benevolent nurture.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The forest rejoices, my Lord, at the wonder that is the Oak of Ages! The Asrai know now that nothing is to be feared, and all will be as the forest intends.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The forest rejoices, my Lord, at the wonder that is the Oak of Ages! The Asrai know now that nothing is to be feared, and all will be as the forest intends.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Mighty halls stand tall among Athel Loren's multifarious glades. Although not protected by walls of brick and stone, intruders are kept at bay by the forest itself, extending a branch or root and dragging trespassers to a smothering, leafy doom.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Mighty halls stand tall among Athel Loren's multifarious glades. Although not protected by walls of brick and stone, intruders are kept at bay by the forest itself, extending a branch or root and dragging trespassers to a smothering, leafy doom.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The lands beyond the forest are rich and prosperous. Claim them for the Asrai and ensure their return to nature's loving, leafy embrace.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The lands beyond the forest are rich and prosperous. Claim them for the Asrai and ensure their return to nature's loving, leafy embrace.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: It is time to establish your first Asrai Lookout beyond Athel Loren's woodland boughs. Establishing such outposts is vitally important, if you wish to conquer the Old World, with a precious piece of Amber your reward for each one constructed.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: It is time to establish your first Asrai Lookout beyond Athel Loren's woodland boughs. Establishing such outposts is vitally important, if you wish to conquer the Old World, with a precious piece of Amber your reward for each one constructed.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Like the Worldroots before it, an Asrai Lookout has succumbed to the enemy, my Lord. Alas, a piece of Amber has been lost along with it.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Like the Worldroots before it, an Asrai Lookout has succumbed to the enemy, my Lord. Alas, a piece of Amber has been lost along with it.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Deep beneath the earth lie the Worldroots, a network of enclosed passageways that connect the great forests of the Old World. Make use of them to quickly travel through otherwise hostile terrain.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Deep beneath the earth lie the Worldroots, a network of enclosed passageways that connect the great forests of the Old World. Make use of them to quickly travel through otherwise hostile terrain.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Though the invading hordes are falling back, my Lord, the Asrai now face one final battle. Let the Horn of Kurnous blast one last time in triumph, and rid the world of these foul creatures forever!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Though the invading hordes are falling back, my Lord, the Asrai now face one final battle. Let the Horn of Kurnous blast one last time in triumph, and rid the world of these foul creatures forever!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Oak of Ages is under attack, my Lord, protect it!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Oak of Ages is under attack, my Lord, protect it!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The elves of Athel Loren are a rare sight. These mysterious beings keep their own company and seldom emerge from their forests. Whilst they are not great in number, cross them at your peril.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The elves of Athel Loren are a rare sight. These mysterious beings keep their own company and seldom emerge from their forests. Whilst they are not great in number, cross them at your peril.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: You, the Asrai of Athel Loren, live in harmony with the great forest you call home. Yet there are those abroad who would endanger this paradise. Wield the sublime fury of nature against your foes and protect this woodland against all that may threaten it.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: You, the Asrai of Athel Loren, live in harmony with the great forest you call home. Yet there are those abroad who would endanger this paradise. Wield the sublime fury of nature against your foes and protect this woodland against all that may threaten it.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your actions have not gone unnoticed, my Lord. Dark forces are now massed all around us - they come to destroy the Oak of Ages! Protect it at all costs, for it is the essence of life within Athel Loren.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your actions have not gone unnoticed, my Lord. Dark forces are now massed all around us - they come to destroy the Oak of Ages! Protect it at all costs, for it is the essence of life within Athel Loren.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Ancient and mighty Durthu, you are roused from slumber. Athel Loren lies in ruin and is in need of your strength.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Ancient and mighty Durthu, you are roused from slumber. Athel Loren lies in ruin and is in need of your strength.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The forest is afflicted with an unknown sickness, weakening all those who dwell beneath its canopies.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The forest is afflicted with an unknown sickness, weakening all those who dwell beneath its canopies.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Many great halls have fallen to darkness, and the once-mighty Oak of Ages is now a bleak shadow of its former glory.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Many great halls have fallen to darkness, and the once-mighty Oak of Ages is now a bleak shadow of its former glory.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: See to the forest's wounds, and do what the Asrai cannot do themselves, keep the Deepwood safe!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: See to the forest's wounds, and do what the Asrai cannot do themselves, keep the Deepwood safe!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The forest rejuvenates, thanks to you. Yet the source of the sickness remains unknown - who is responsible?

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The forest rejuvenates, thanks to you. Yet the source of the sickness remains unknown - who is responsible?

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Perhaps the ignorant Bretonnian interlopers, or the verminous mountain Goblins? Whoever the culprit, we must march on their lands and seize them as penance.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Perhaps the ignorant Bretonnian interlopers, or the verminous mountain Goblins? Whoever the culprit, we must march on their lands and seize them as penance.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Beastmen have arrived to terrorise the forest! The Deepwood once more faces peril from these braying, snorting herds.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Beastmen have arrived to terrorise the forest! The Deepwood once more faces peril from these braying, snorting herds.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: They seem to march without a leader, but their dark desires unify them all the same.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: They seem to march without a leader, but their dark desires unify them all the same.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The forest is with you, Durthu. The ever-increasing threat of the Beastmen must be defeated immediately!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The forest is with you, Durthu. The ever-increasing threat of the Beastmen must be defeated immediately!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Morghur! The vile, twisted Beastlord of corruption and mutation emerges from the shadows to rain his destruction upon Athel Loren. We cannot allow him to exact his desires upon us, Durthu!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Morghur! The vile, twisted Beastlord of corruption and mutation emerges from the shadows to rain his destruction upon Athel Loren. We cannot allow him to exact his desires upon us, Durthu!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: He makes for the Oak of Ages, with all his hordes at his back; we cannot allow him to exact his desires upon us, Durthu!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: He makes for the Oak of Ages, with all his hordes at his back; we cannot allow him to exact his desires upon us, Durthu!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Morghur is struck from this world, nothing more than a stain upon the battlefield! A great victory has been won this day.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Morghur is struck from this world, nothing more than a stain upon the battlefield! A great victory has been won this day.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: You should look now to remove the miasma of corruption that Morghur and his vile ways have left behind, and rejuvenate the Oak of Ages.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: You should look now to remove the miasma of corruption that Morghur and his vile ways have left behind, and rejuvenate the Oak of Ages.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: My Lord! It is … it is Morghur! He is returned! I did not believe the Asrai tales to be any more than stories, but his spirit is indeed reborn to this world!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: My Lord! It is … it is Morghur! He is returned! I did not believe the Asrai tales to be any more than stories, but his spirit is indeed reborn to this world!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: His immortal soul is anchored to our world through foul magic beyond understanding. His defeat has slighted him, now he moves for the mountains intent on poisoning the water that flows from the Silver Spire.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: His immortal soul is anchored to our world through foul magic beyond understanding. His defeat has slighted him, now he moves for the mountains intent on poisoning the water that flows from the Silver Spire.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Morghur's forces will not relent until you are defeated. You must keep them at bay whilst strengthening the Oak of Ages, for only the Oak's power can hope to break Morghur's hold on immortality. Hurry; there is not much time!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Morghur's forces will not relent until you are defeated. You must keep them at bay whilst strengthening the Oak of Ages, for only the Oak's power can hope to break Morghur's hold on immortality. Hurry; there is not much time!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: You are imbued with the Oak's power now, Durthu, the forest is your strength. Such a power can destroy Morghur once and for all - go now, march to him, stop his plans. Destroy him forever!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: You are imbued with the Oak's power now, Durthu, the forest is your strength. Such a power can destroy Morghur once and for all - go now, march to him, stop his plans. Destroy him forever!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Does rage still beat in your heart, Durthu? Even now, with Morghur consigned to oblivion and the world returned from the brink? Does war still drive your mind?

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Does rage still beat in your heart, Durthu? Even now, with Morghur consigned to oblivion and the world returned from the brink? Does war still drive your mind?

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your dreams are disturbed by voices that speak of your failures, but mark this amongst your successes. There can be no greater victory.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your dreams are disturbed by voices that speak of your failures, but mark this amongst your successes. There can be no greater victory.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: You were roused from slumber to achieve this; to defeat the evil that threatened the Deepwood. Perhaps now you can rest again?

advice_levels.onscreen_text: You were roused from slumber to achieve this; to defeat the evil that threatened the Deepwood. Perhaps now you can rest again?

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your sorrow is boundless and anger all-consuming. Sleep now in the forest's arms, ancient Durthu, let fitful and restless sleep torment you until you are woken again…

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your sorrow is boundless and anger all-consuming. Sleep now in the forest's arms, ancient Durthu, let fitful and restless sleep torment you until you are woken again…

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Greetings Orion, King in the Woods - you awake to a world sorely in need of you. Athel Loren lies broken and in ruin.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Greetings Orion, King in the Woods - you awake to a world sorely in need of you. Athel Loren lies broken and in ruin.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: A sickness lies upon the forest, sapping its strength.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: A sickness lies upon the forest, sapping its strength.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: With it many great halls have fallen to darkness in your absence, and the once-mighty Oak of Ages is now a bleak shadow of its former glory.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: With it many great halls have fallen to darkness in your absence, and the once-mighty Oak of Ages is now a bleak shadow of its former glory.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Though you are born into fleeting life, Orion, through your strength the forest will heal. This is the time of rebirth - for Ariel, for Kurnous, and for Athel Loren!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Though you are born into fleeting life, Orion, through your strength the forest will heal. This is the time of rebirth - for Ariel, for Kurnous, and for Athel Loren!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your halls are secure once more, Orion, but the larger question still remains; who is to blame for the damage done?

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your halls are secure once more, Orion, but the larger question still remains; who is to blame for the damage done?

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Mayhap our neighbours, the Bretonnians? Or the ever-festering Orcs from the mountains? Whoever is responsible, we must push forth from the forests to seize their lands in retribution.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Mayhap our neighbours, the Bretonnians? Or the ever-festering Orcs from the mountains? Whoever is responsible, we must push forth from the forests to seize their lands in retribution.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Riotous Beastmen have been spotted near our borders, my Lord, doubtless intent on spreading their Chaotic brutality. They are surely responsible for defiling our halls; it is what they live for.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Riotous Beastmen have been spotted near our borders, my Lord, doubtless intent on spreading their Chaotic brutality. They are surely responsible for defiling our halls; it is what they live for.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: They appear now leaderless, but still single-mindedly bent on a vision of pure destruction.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: They appear now leaderless, but still single-mindedly bent on a vision of pure destruction.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The threat they pose is ever-increasing. Do not underestimate them; they are the enemy of all civilisation. You must confront these ravenous beasts and put them to rout.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The threat they pose is ever-increasing. Do not underestimate them; they are the enemy of all civilisation. You must confront these ravenous beasts and put them to rout.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Morghur! The vile, twisted Beastlord of corruption and mutation emerges from the shadows to rain his destruction upon our realm.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Morghur! The vile, twisted Beastlord of corruption and mutation emerges from the shadows to rain his destruction upon our realm.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: He makes for the Oak of Ages, with all his hordes at his back; we cannot allow him to exact his desires upon us, Orion!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: He makes for the Oak of Ages, with all his hordes at his back; we cannot allow him to exact his desires upon us, Orion!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Morghur falls! Take heart, for the Asrai prevail against this tide of corruption. A great victory has been won this day.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Morghur falls! Take heart, for the Asrai prevail against this tide of corruption. A great victory has been won this day.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: You should look now to remove the miasma of corruption that Morghur and his vile ways have left behind, and rejuvenate the Oak of Ages.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: You should look now to remove the miasma of corruption that Morghur and his vile ways have left behind, and rejuvenate the Oak of Ages.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: My Lord! It is Morghur! He has returned! I did not believe the Asrai tales to be any more than stories, but his spirit is indeed reborn to this world!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: My Lord! It is Morghur! He has returned! I did not believe the Asrai tales to be any more than stories, but his spirit is indeed reborn to this world!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: His immortal soul is tethered to our plane through weird and heretical means. Slighted by defeat, he lusts now for ultimate revenge. Even now, he marches for the mountains, intent on poisoning the water that flows from the Silver Spire.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: His immortal soul is tethered to our plane through weird and heretical means. Slighted by defeat, he lusts now for ultimate revenge. Even now, he marches for the mountains, intent on poisoning the water that flows from the Silver Spire.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Morghur's forces will not relent until you are defeated. Push them back, Orion, and strengthen the Oak of Ages, for only the Oak's power can hope to break Morghur's hold on immortality. Hurry; there is not much time!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Morghur's forces will not relent until you are defeated. Push them back, Orion, and strengthen the Oak of Ages, for only the Oak's power can hope to break Morghur's hold on immortality. Hurry; there is not much time!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The power of the forest flows through you now, Orion - you have the strength to stop Morghur. Go now; his victory is within his reach. March on him, stop the carnage! Stop Morghur!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The power of the forest flows through you now, Orion - you have the strength to stop Morghur. Go now; his victory is within his reach. March on him, stop the carnage! Stop Morghur!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Victory! Morghur is relegated to oblivion, Orion, along with his feculent ilk!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Victory! Morghur is relegated to oblivion, Orion, along with his feculent ilk!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: You have held Athel Loren against the beastly hordes and averted absolute catastrophe from befalling the entire world.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: You have held Athel Loren against the beastly hordes and averted absolute catastrophe from befalling the entire world.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Now, winter is approaching; we all feel the icy chill upon the air. The time has come for you to return to the Oak of Ages; Ariel is calling.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Now, winter is approaching; we all feel the icy chill upon the air. The time has come for you to return to the Oak of Ages; Ariel is calling.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Step into Athel Loren's leafy embrace and begin the cycle of renewal once again. This is one end, Orion, but every end is a new beginning…

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Step into Athel Loren's leafy embrace and begin the cycle of renewal once again. This is one end, Orion, but every end is a new beginning…

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Greetings to you, Morghur, eternal agent of change. You are reborn from Chaos once again that you may hasten the mutation of this world, and bring Ruin to its people.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Greetings to you, Morghur, eternal agent of change. You are reborn from Chaos once again that you may hasten the mutation of this world, and bring Ruin to its people.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Man has ever been the true enemy of the Beastmen, Morghur, and none more so than the hated Empire. Descend upon their lands and bring down a fury that will shake the foundations of the earth!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Man has ever been the true enemy of the Beastmen, Morghur, and none more so than the hated Empire. Descend upon their lands and bring down a fury that will shake the foundations of the earth!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Yet there are others who would oppose you. The Wood Elves, hidden behind their sanctuary trees, have long stood in opposition to your goals. Twist their gnarled roots into unknowable agony; let them know defeat!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Yet there are others who would oppose you. The Wood Elves, hidden behind their sanctuary trees, have long stood in opposition to your goals. Twist their gnarled roots into unknowable agony; let them know defeat!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: To the north, more men stand against you. They who call themselves 'Bretonnians' should be utterly crushed - their glittering spires and dreams of chivalry brought to nought but rubble!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: To the north, more men stand against you. They who call themselves 'Bretonnians' should be utterly crushed - their glittering spires and dreams of chivalry brought to nought but rubble!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: You are Morghur, the Shadowgave, the Master of Skulls. Your time is now. Visit upon this world such horrors that generations yet unborn will scream in torment!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: You are Morghur, the Shadowgave, the Master of Skulls. Your time is now. Visit upon this world such horrors that generations yet unborn will scream in torment!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: My Lord! His immortal soul is tethered to our plane through weird and heretical means. Only the Oak's power can hope to break Morghur's hold on immortality.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: My Lord! His immortal soul is tethered to our plane through weird and heretical means. Only the Oak's power can hope to break Morghur's hold on immortality.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Be ever vigilant, my eternal Lord. I come to render my assistance to the forest, for this is a time of great peril for Athel Loren; potential enemies are at every turn.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Be ever vigilant, my eternal Lord. I come to render my assistance to the forest, for this is a time of great peril for Athel Loren; potential enemies are at every turn.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: To the north, the Bretonnians lie in wait. We must tread carefully, for their expansionist desires are well known, yet they could be firm allies against other foes.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: To the north, the Bretonnians lie in wait. We must tread carefully, for their expansionist desires are well known, yet they could be firm allies against other foes.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Furthermore, Greenskin incursions are increasing - they defile the sanctity of the forests with their filth. The only answer is war - move against their mountain hovels and end their sorry sorties.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: To the west, the Beastmen herds are massing. These cloven beasts will desecrate everything, including your sacred woodlands, unless stopped by force of arms. You must turn the tables, take the hunt to them - the taint of Chaos must not despoil the King's Glade!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Hail to you, o cold and beautiful Isabella! Mannfred dwells in Castle Drakenhof, your rightful home! So whilst you should be rightfully proud of what you have achieved so far, there is clearly still much to be done.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Templehof brood control the lands to the north, as far as the River Stir. They cannot be suffered to endure, lest they threaten your strength. Raise your forces, march on the foe, and show them true terror!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Templehof brood control the lands to the north, as far as the River Stir. They cannot be suffered to endure, lest they threaten your strength. Raise your forces, march on the foe, and show them true terror!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The high mountains to the south are infested with Dwarfs. Our lands will never be safe with such an enemy so close. Make plans to drive out their stunted kind in time.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The high mountains to the south are infested with Dwarfs. Our lands will never be safe with such an enemy so close. Make plans to drive out their stunted kind in time.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: You are the power behind the mightiest of the von Carstein bloodline. Cruel and wicked mistress - the world shudders at what ruin you might make.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: You are the power behind the mightiest of the von Carstein bloodline. Cruel and wicked mistress - the world shudders at what ruin you might make.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: So set forth, Isabella, wife and warrior, beauty, and horror. The fury in your eyes will bring this world to its knees!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: So set forth, Isabella, wife and warrior, beauty, and horror. The fury in your eyes will bring this world to its knees!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: War has brought us to these unforgiving wastes, where the Ruinous Powers lie in wait to ensnare us. But Bretonnian Knights are formidable warriors and driven by the most noble of purposes! The Kingdom is relying on you, my Lord, you must drive the filth back into the mire!

But Bretonnian Knights are formidable warriors and driven by the most noble of purposes! The Kingdom is relying on you, my Lord, you must drive the filth back into the mire!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Badlands teem with Greenskins, my Lord; this truly is the belly of the beast! Orcs and Goblins move to trap your forces. – You must endure the green tide, fight hard to overcome it, and smite this evil, in the Lady’s blessed name!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Badlands teem with Greenskins, my Lord; this truly is the belly of the beast! Orcs and Goblins move to trap your forces. – You must endure the green tide, fight hard to overcome it, and smite this evil, in the Lady’s blessed name!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: A blessing has been bestowed upon these men. The Lady will protect them for their heroism.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: A blessing has been bestowed upon these men. The Lady will protect them for their heroism.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Lady blesses these men and grants them protection for their actions.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Lady blesses these men and grants them protection for their actions.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: These men will resist the enemies of Bretonnia, with the Lady now protecting them.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: These men will resist the enemies of Bretonnia, with the Lady now protecting them.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Lady no longer favours these men, for they retreat from battle.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Lady no longer favours these men, for they retreat from battle.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: A display of noble action and good intent, my Lord. Good things will come to those that possess these virtues.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: A display of noble action and good intent, my Lord. Good things will come to those that possess these virtues.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: These are troubled times indeed when such unchivalrous actions are deemed just. Let us turn a blind eye to them for now.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: These are troubled times indeed when such unchivalrous actions are deemed just. Let us turn a blind eye to them for now.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your current actions are quite unchivalrous, my Lord. You do not display the virtues you once did.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your current actions are quite unchivalrous, my Lord. You do not display the virtues you once did.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Knightly Orders were formed by a chivalric code, your actions leave them questioning you.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Knightly Orders were formed by a chivalric code, your actions leave them questioning you.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Bretonnia weeps, for your honour and chivalry have been lost this day.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Bretonnia weeps, for your honour and chivalry have been lost this day.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Many unscrupulous actions have taken you down a dark and unchivalrous path, my Lord. You will no doubt feel the Lady's wrath for this.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Many unscrupulous actions have taken you down a dark and unchivalrous path, my Lord. You will no doubt feel the Lady's wrath for this.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Noble indeed my Lord. Like the Grail Companions before you, you honour the code of chivalry and will be rewarded for it.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Noble indeed my Lord. Like the Grail Companions before you, you honour the code of chivalry and will be rewarded for it.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Lady looks upon you favourably, my Lord. Bretonnia rejoices under your chivalric rule and courageous acts.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The Lady looks upon you favourably, my Lord. Bretonnia rejoices under your chivalric rule and courageous acts.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Bells ring out through the lands, Bretonnia prospers this day under your chivalric rule. Many great virtues will be bestowed upon you.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Bells ring out through the lands, Bretonnia prospers this day under your chivalric rule. Many great virtues will be bestowed upon you.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: My Lord, the Dukes of Bretonnia have resided under a chivalrous code for many years. Honour this tradition, build upon the great foundations of Gilles le Breton, and lead the Knightly Orders forward, to glory!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: My Lord, the Dukes of Bretonnia have resided under a chivalrous code for many years. Honour this tradition, build upon the great foundations of Gilles le Breton, and lead the Knightly Orders forward, to glory!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Our lands prosper under your chivalrous rule, yet evil still breeds in every corner. Many look to destroy Bretonnia, and their power grows as quickly as our own. Stave off their advances and unite the banners of Bretonnia through your chivalric actions!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Our lands prosper under your chivalrous rule, yet evil still breeds in every corner. Many look to destroy Bretonnia, and their power grows as quickly as our own. Stave off their advances and unite the banners of Bretonnia through your chivalric actions!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Bretonnia stands strong as the protector of honour and chivalry. Yet one last challenge must still be met, in the wastes of the Old World. Our King perpares for battle on the grandest of scales and calls forth an Errantry War. I ask you now to bestow your great virtues upon us and lead the Knightly Orders to their final victory over our enemy!

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Bretonnia stands strong as the protector of honour and chivalry. Yet one last challenge must still be met, in the wastes of the Old World. Our King perpares for battle on the grandest of scales and calls forth an Errantry War. I ask you now to bestow your great virtues upon us and lead the Knightly Orders to their final victory over our enemy!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Bretonnia flowers in true splendour - tales shall be told of your chivalric deeds for years to come! As our borders expand so our code of chivalry spreads with it. Do not relent, for Bretonnia will be the beacon of light in this ever crumbling world.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Bretonnia flowers in true splendour - tales shall be told of your chivalric deeds for years to come! As our borders expand so our code of chivalry spreads with it. Do not relent, for Bretonnia will be the beacon of light in this ever crumbling world.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Folklore tells of a mighty champion who will emerge from the mist to protect the Dukes of Bretonnia in their hour of need, cleansing the land of its enemies.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Folklore tells of a mighty champion who will emerge from the mist to protect the Dukes of Bretonnia in their hour of need, cleansing the land of its enemies.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Your chivalrous code has not gone unnoticed. The skies cloud over and twilight has fallen. A figure stands ready; its eyes ablaze with fay light in the mist.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Your chivalrous code has not gone unnoticed. The skies cloud over and twilight has fallen. A figure stands ready; its eyes ablaze with fay light in the mist.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Like in the childhood tales of old, the Green Knight rides for battle, striking fear into all those that oppose Bretonnia.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Like in the childhood tales of old, the Green Knight rides for battle, striking fear into all those that oppose Bretonnia.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Alas the Green Knight fades with the mist as quickly as he emerged. Perhaps he will appear again when the need is great?

advice_levels.onscreen_text: Alas the Green Knight fades with the mist as quickly as he emerged. Perhaps he will appear again when the need is great?

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The peasants of Bretonnia are the workforce of our farms and mills. Enlisting too many to bolster your forces will come at a cost to your farming income.

advice_levels.onscreen_text: The peasants of Bretonnia are the workforce of our farms and mills. Enlisting too many to bolster your forces will come at a cost to your farming income.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Our fields and orchards are short of workers and with it our income dwindles. See that manpower is improved to reap the benefits of the land.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Workers return to the fields. Crops now grow with abundance and our coffers are full with gold once more.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Hail, Alberic, Duke of Bordeleaux! The salty sea air is a bracing reprieve from the cloying, inland darkness that now threatens the coast.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Directly North, the damned city of Mousillon spits out dark forces that you must deal with. Bretonnia may ignore this blight, but you cannot.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: King Leoncoeur resides at Couronne, but is beset by the Greenskin threat from the nearby mountains. You are expected to aid the Crown, but ultimately it is your choice alone.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Merchant Princes of Marienburg have no love for Bretonnia, they are more concerned with the accumulation of wealth. Gluttons, yes, but perhaps useful…

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The mountains teem with Greenskins and Dwarfs, constantly warring with one another. Should they descend from their peaks into Bretonnia, conflict will surely follow.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: A storm is brewing above Bretonnia, my Lord, with a ferocity that Bordeleaux cannot avoid. You may not be King, Alberic, but Manann watches over you. Use his thalassic strength to defend Bordeleaux and wash your enemies away!

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Blessings on you and your lands, wise and Fay Enchantress. Your Kingdom is in peril and has need of your strength- dark clouds are brewing abroad.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: The Elves of Athel Loren grow bold of late. Their expansionist desires see them encroaching beyond the limits of the forest. Hold your own against their ilk.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Greetings to you, benevolent Royarch. Blessed is your rule over Bretonnia, yet darkness spreads from abroad and threatens your Kingdom. The threat is real; it must be faced.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Further South, in the Grey Mountains, Greenskins and Dwarfs vie for control of the peaks. Whoever wins may yet cause trouble for you, my Lord…

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Beyond, the Wood Elves in their mysterious forest protect their homes. Whilst at the coast, the Duke of Bordeleaux is as unpredictable as the roiling sea and as secretive as the watery depths.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Elsewhere, the Unliving Lords of Mousillon wage war against mortal men. The bickering Dukedoms ignore the looming threat, and so it falls to you to act, my Liege.

onscreen_text.last_approved_text: Only a united Bretonnia can face these growing perils. Raise your banner, King Leoncoeur, and drive this evil from the world in the Lady's blessed name!
